entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
